"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>10badeb1-f16e-416c-807f-5427644868fa#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A K-Na-pumpa működése</string>
            <string language="en">Operation of the K-Na-pump</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operation der K-Na-Pumpe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctionnement de la K-Na-pompe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Operação da K-Na-bomba</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamento della K-Na-pompa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργία της Κ-NA-ANTLJ'AS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Operación de la K-Na-bomba</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Na-K-pumpa - aktív transzportot szabályozó membránfehérje rajza</string>
            <string language="en">The K-Na-pump - drawing of active transport regulating membrane-protein</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szabályozás,  idegrendszer,  ingerület,  nyugalmi potenciál,  akciós potenciál,  </string>
            <string language="en">regulation, nervous system, excitation, repose potential, impulse potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die K-Na-Pumpe - Zeichnung aktiver Transport des 
regelnden Membrane-Proteins</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La K-Na-pompe - schéma de membrane-protéine de 
régulation de transport actif</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A K-Na-bomba - desenho da membrana-proteína 
regulando do transporte ativo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La K-Na-pompa - illustrazione della 
membrana-proteina regolante di trasporto attivo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Κ-NA-ANTLJ'A - σχέδιο της ενεργού ρυθμίζοντας 
μεμβράνη-πρωτεϊ'νης μεταφορών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La K-Na-bomba - gráfico de la membrana-protei'na 
de regulación del transporte activo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung, nervöses System, Erregung, Ruhepotential, 
Antriebpotential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règlement, système nerveux, excitation, potentiel de 
repos, potentiel d'impulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">regulamento, sistema nervoso, excitação, potencial do
repose, potencial do impulso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regolazione, sistema nervoso, eccitazione, potenziale di
riposo, potenziale di impulso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανονισμός, νευρικό σύστημα, διέγερση, δυνατότητα 
ανάπαυσης, δυνατότητα ώθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regulación, sistema nervioso, excitación, potencial 
del descanso, potencial del impulso</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
